name: Burner's Solar System Project
description:
Solar System project for Coursera's Game Design and Development course. An interactive solar system where you can choose what planet you want to focus on. 

Changes made:

  1. Added all planets even Pluto to solar system. 
  2. Adjusted size of Earth, and Moon to more accurately reflect the Solar system
  3. Created semi realistic sizes and rotations to each planet based on size order and speed order via sun rotation for each planet. 
  4. Adjusted lighting for sun
  5. Adjusted both Main Camera and mini map Camera to view the extended solar system.
  6. Adjusted mini map back drop to a darker color
  7. Re organized assets to reflect solar system order
